params.borrowAmount: - the amount of lending token borrowed
params.borrowTokenId: - the id of address of lending token in list `lendingTokens`
params.prjAddress: - the address of project token that forwarded by frontend or backend
params.prjAmount: - the amount of project token that forwarded by frontend or backend

params.beneficiar: - the receiver address of prj position
params.prjDepositAmount: - the amount of project token deposited
params.tokenPrjId: - the id of address of project token in list `projectTokens`

params.amountPrjLiquidated: - the amount of project tokens that is liquidated by liquidator
params.lendingTokenId: - the id of address of lending token in list `lendingTokens`
params.prjId: - the id of address of project token in list `projectTokens`

params.ltfDenominator: - the denominator of liquidation threshold factor ratio
params.ltfNumerator: - the numerator of liquidation threshold factor ratio

params.lvrDenominator: - the denominator of loan to value ratio
params.lvrNumerator: - the numerator of loan to value ratio

params.redeemAmount: - the amount of lending cToken redeemed by `who`
params.redeemTokenId: - the id of address of lending token in list `lendingTokens`

params.redeemAmountUnderlying: - the amount of lending token redeemed by `who`
params.redeemTokenId: - the id of address of lending token in list `lendingTokens`

params.borrowAmount: - the amount of lending token borrowed
params.borrowTokenId: - the id of address of lending token in list `lendingTokens`
params.prjAddress: - the address of project token that forwarded by frontend or backend
params.prjAmount: - the amount of project token that forwarded by frontend or backend

params.amountSupplyCTokenReceived: - the amount of cToken received by `who`
params.supplyAmount: - the amount of lending token including decimals
params.supplyTokenId: - the id of address of lending token in list `lendingTokens`

params.beneficiar: - the receiver address of project tokens
params.prjWithdrawAmount: - the amount of project token withdrawed
params.tokenPrjId: - the id of address of project token in list `projectTokens`

addCLendingToken(address,address).details: adds the cToken of lending token to Primary Index Token

addLendingToken(address).details: adds lending token to Primary Index Token

addPrjToken(address,uint8,uint8,uint8,ui.details: adds the project token to Primary Index Token

params._ltfDenominator: - the denominator of liquidation treshold factor
params._ltfNumerator: - the numerator of liquidation treshold factor
params._lvrDenominator: - the denominator of loan to value ratio
params._lvrNumerator: - the numerator of loan to value ratio
params._saleDenominator: - the denominator of project token sale
params._saleNumerator: - the numerator of project token sale

balanceOfPit(address).details: returns the amount of PIT of account

balanceOfPitPosition(address,uint256).details: returns the amount of PIT of account in position `prjId`

params.prjId: the project token id in list `projectTokens`

basicToken().details: returns the basic token. By default, this is the address of USDC.

borrow(uint256,uint256).details: borrow the lending token from pool

params.amountLendingToken: the amount of lending token to borrow.
params.lendingTokenId: the lending token id in list `lendingTokens`

cTokensList(address).details: return the address of cToken of `lendingToken`

comptroller().details: returns the address of comptroller contract

decimals().details: returns the decimals of Primary Index Token

deposit(uint256,uint256).details: deposit the project token to Bonded primary index token.      The position will be supplied to msg.sender

params.amountPrj: the amount of project token included decimals
params.prjId: the project token id in list `projectTokens`

depositTo(uint256,uint256,address).details: deposit the project token to Bonded primary index token.      The position will be supplied to `beneficiar`

params.amountPrj: the amount of project token included decimals
params.beneficiar: the address of receiver of project token position
params.prjId: the project token id in list `projectTokens`

params.lendingTokenId: the lending token id in list `lendingTokens`

getDepositedPrjAmount(address,uint256).details: returns the deposited prj amount of `account`

params.prjId: the project token id in list `projectTokens`

getPrjEvaluationInBasicToken(address,uin.details: get project token evaluation depending on

params.prjAmount: - the amount of project token including decimals

getPrjEvaluationInLendingTokenWithSale(a.details: gets the evaluation of project token with sale in dimention of lending token

params.amountPrj: - the amount of project token including decimals

getPrjEvaluationInLendingTokenWithoutSal.details: gets the raw evaluation of project token in dimention of lending token

params.amountPrj: - amount of project token including decimals

params.lendingTokenId: the lending token id in list `lendingTokens`

indexLendingToken(address).details: returns the index of address of lending token in list `lendingTokens`

indexPrjToken(address).details: returns the index of address of project token in list `projectTokens`

lendingTokens(uint256).details: returns the address of project token

params.lendingTokenId: - id of project token in list `lendingTokens`.                         starts from 0 to lendingTokens.length-1;

returns._0: the length of listed lending tokens

liquidate(address,uint256,uint256).details: liquidate the borrower position. Liquidates all project token position of borrower

params.lendingTokenId: the lending token id in list `lendingTokens`
params.prjId: the project token id in list `projectTokens`

liquidationThreshold(address).details: get the liquidation treshold factor of `account`

liquidationThresholdForPosition(address,.details: get the liquidation treshold factor of `account` for position

params.prjId: the project token id in list `projectTokens`

ltf(address).details: returns the Liquidation Threshold Factor of lending token

lvr(address).details: returns the Loan to Value Ratio of project token.

priceOracle().details: return the address of price oracle contract

projectTokens(uint256).details: returns the address of project token

params.projectTokenId: - id of project token in list.                         starts from 0 to projectTokens.length-1;

returns._0: the length of listed project tokens

redeem(uint256,uint256).details: redeem the lending token from pool.      The msg.sender should approve cToken to transferFrom.

params.amountCLendingToken: the amount of Clending token to redeem
params.lendingTokenId: the lending token id in list `lendingTokens`

redeemUnderlying(uint256,uint256).details: redeem the lending token from pool.

params.amountLendingToken: the amount of lending token to redeem
params.lendingTokenId: the lending token id in list `lendingTokens`

repayBorrow(uint256,uint256,address,uint.details: repay the lending token from pool

params.amountLendingToken: the amount of lending token to repay.
params.lendingTokenId: the lending token id in list `lendingTokens`

setCPrimaryIndexToken(address).details: sets the cPrimary Index Token to Primary Index Token

params._cPrimaryIndexToken: - the address of cPrimary Index Token

setComptroller(address).details: sets comptroller address to Primary Index Token

setPriceOracle(address).details: sets the price oracle to Primary Index Token

params._priceOracle: - the address of price oracle contract

suppliedLendingToken(address,uint256).details: @param user - the address of user, who borrowed lending token

params.lendingTokenId: - id of project token in list `lendingTokens`.                         starts from 0 to lendingTokens.length-1;

supply(uint256,uint256).details: supply the lending token to pool.      The msg.sender will receive cToken of lending token.

params.lendingTokenId: the lending token id in list `lendingTokens`

totalStakedPrj(address).details: return the total staked of project token

totalSupplyPit().details: returns the total supply of Primary Index Token

uniswapPathFinder().details: return the address of uniswapPathFinder contract

params.lendingTokenId: - id of project token in list `lendingTokens`.                         starts from 0 to lendingTokens.length-1;
params.user: - the address of user, who borrowed lending token

userPrjPosition(address,uint256).details: return the amount of deposited project token by `user`

params.prjId: - the id of project token in list `projectTokens`

withdraw(uint256,uint256).details: withdraw the project token from position.      The project tokens will be withdrawn to msg.sender

params.amountPrj: the amount of project token included decimals
params.prjId: the project token id in list `projectTokens`

withdrawTo(uint256,uint256,address).details: withdraw the project token from position.      The project tokens will be withdrawn to `beneficiar`

params.amountPrj: the amount of project token included decimals
params.prjId: the project token id in list `projectTokens`

balanceOfPitDependingOnPrj(address,uint2.notice: return the pitBalance depending on input prj indexes
